cards.text: Forced - After you enter Satyr Lounge: Test [willpower] (3). If you fail, shuffle a set-aside copy of Gazing Into Oblivion into the encounter deck. [free] Spend 1 [per_investigator] clues: Take control of the set-aside Lotto Voucher story asset.

cards.flavor: "I had all of these visions before coming down here, of utopia. Every man with his hand on the Great Chain, the wheel of progress turning -- every cliché you can imagine. And what is the first thing that happens when I open up shop? Petty thievery."
cards.name: Business Sector
cards.text: Business Sector is connected to each revealed [[Market Street]] location.

cards.name: Deep Sea Offspring
cards.text: Swarming 2. Elusive. Forced - At the end of the enemy phase, if Thälassárïth targeted Deep Sea Offspring: Attach 1 swarm card to Deep Sea Offspring.

cards.name: The Cocktail Lounge
cards.text: The Cocktail Lounge gets -1 shroud for each revealed location connected to it. Forced - After you fail a skill test while attacking at this location: Increase this location's shroud value by 1 for the remainder of the round.

cards.flavor: The room stinks of stale gin and sea rot, its bar falling into disrepair.
cards.name: The Cocktail Lounge
cards.text: The path leading to The Cocktail Lounge is blocked. As an additional cost for you to enter The Cocktail Lounge, investigators must spend 1 [per_investigator] clues, as a group.

cards.flavor: You look up, then back at your team, in a state of sheer terror. Whatever's up there, it's coming for you. And it's coming fast.
cards.name: Escape Velocity (v. II)
cards.text: Thälassárïth can be attacked by [[Spell]] or [[Firearm]] cards at connecting locations. Forced - At the end of the enemy phase, flip Thälassárïth over and move it up or down, whichever direction continues its current serpentine pattern. Forced - At the end of your turn, if you are at an Abyssal Currents location: Take 1 direct horror.

cards.name: Sinking Upwards
cards.text:
Raging currents, shifting structures, and a beast eager to protect its domain. It seems as though the trip was, after all, a futile one, as you collapse into yourself, besieged by the onslaught of pressure. The voices of your compatriots falling to a simmer, replaced by the faintest, mesmeric hum. It calls to you, from the beyond. Transfixed, you embrace the darkness that lies below. You welcome its gaping maw. And it welcomes you home.
Each investigator is defeated and suffers 1 physical or 1 mental trauma. (Note: Do not remove your health and sanity tokens as they are tabulated during the resolution of this scenario.)

cards.name: Severed Bond
cards.text: Revelation - If you are a... - Little Sister, swap places with the furthest Big Daddy investigator. - Big Daddy, swap places with the furthest Little Sister investigator. If you cannot perform either action, Severed Bond gains surge.

cards.name: Staircase to Oblivion
cards.text:
[free]: Look at the back of this location. Then, you may choose to flip this location.
[action]: Test [agility] (2) to scale the plateau. If you succeed, move X cards from one side to another, where X is the amount you succeeded by. (Limit one success per round.)

cards.flavor:
"The ocean would not touch them. Even the tide knew to stay away."
-- Dr. Brigid Tenenbaum
cards.name: Gates of R'lyeh
cards.text: [action]: Parley. You may take 2 additional actions during your turn, which can only be used on the Mirror side.

cards.name: Lotto Voucher
cards.text:
Remnants of cigarette butts, coffee stains, and paper flakes cover a scratcher hastily left in a garbage bin at Satyr Lounge. "Sir Prize: Games Of Chance" adorns its backside, but it's the scribbled note that catches your eye: "I owe you," signed "B.D."
If any investigator has the [[Detective]], [[Hunter, or Reporter]] trait, read the following:
Glinting from behind the bin's clutter you discover an Accu-Vox concealed out of plain sight. You play the recording: "I'm tellin' you, one more game! I got it en me boss, ain't no tellin' what this'll do." (whines can be heard from behind the voice). "Sally, baby girl. Not now. Did ya hear, just one more go and when daddy strikes it big we'll head on down to Ryan Amusements! How's that sound?... Sally?"
Flip this card over.

cards.name: Lotto Voucher
cards.text: Forced - When you gain control of Lotto Voucher, flip it over and resolve its text. [free] At the start of your turn, exhaust Lotto Voucher and spend 1 resource: Reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If a chaos token with a non-negative modifier is revealed, gain 5 resources. If a [elder_thing] or [auto_fail] is revealed, end your turn.

cards.flavor: "Wormwood you say, eh?"
cards.name: Wisdom Of The Crowd
cards.text: Peril. Revelation - You must decide (choose one): - Take 1 damage and/or horror equal to your location's shroud value. - Shuffle this card, and a set-aside Gazing Into Oblivion, into the encounter deck.

cards.flavor: Mold and fungus grows in the corners, unabated.
cards.name: Empty Room
cards.text: Forced - When you reveal Empty Room: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[Trap]] treachery and draw it. Each [[Veteran]] investigator gains: Ignore the forced ability above.

cards.flavor:
"The Little Sister's Orphanage: In troubled times, give your little girl the life that she deserves. Boarding and education free of charge! After all, children ARE the future of Rapture."
― Public Address Advertisement
cards.name: Little Sister's Orphanage
Atrium
cards.text: While you are at the Atrium, you cannot play [[Weapon]] assets. Each [[Agency]], [[Detective]], and [[Police]] investigator ignores this restriction. Forced - After you fail an attack or evasion attempt against a retaliate or alert enemy (respectively) at this location, that enemy attacks twice.

cards.flavor: Imposing architecture surrounds guests mingling about, as statues of gargantuan proportion loom over the lobby. One reads: "The Great Chain is guided by our hand."
cards.name: Atrium

cards.flavor: What need would a utopia have for mines, if not to protect itself from invaders?
cards.name: Minefields
cards.text: Revelation - If the Bathysphere is not in play, Minefields gains surge. Otherwise, test [agility] (3). For each point you fail by, deal 1 damage to the Bathysphere.

cards.name: Automated Turret
cards.text: Spawn - Nearest empty location. [reaction] When you enter Automated Turret's location, test [agility] (4). If you succeed, automatically evade Automated Turret. If you fail, Automated Turret makes an immediate attack. Forced - If a [[Surveillance]] treachery spots you at a connecting location, and Automated Turret is ready, it makes an immediate attack.

cards.name: The Walls
cards.text: [free]: Move. Move to a revealed The Walls location. Big Daddies and [[Humanoid]] enemies cannot enter The Walls. When placed or spawned here, place Big Daddy investigators and [[Humanoid]] enemies on the nearest [[Facility]] location, instead.

cards.flavor: A funhouse of colors and steel line the inner-walls of Point Prometheus, granting access to the little ones via their art deco hidey-holes.
cards.name: The Walls
cards.text: The Walls is inaccessible to Big Daddies. Only Little Sister's at a connected [[Altered]] location may enter The Walls.

cards.flavor: The bathysphere station is near, that much you can be sure of. With two souls by your side that are eager to leave this city behind - whether they know it or not - a rush of motivation washes over you. Annabelle and Booker must return home.
cards.name: Journey to the Surface
cards.text: [action]: Explore. Draw the bottom card of the exploration deck. If it is a connecting location, put it into play and move to it. Objective - If each undefeated investigator has resigned, advance.

cards.name: Ride Into The Sun
cards.text:
If you read Masterdom:
Chased by all manner of crazies, helped by an even more deranged one holding a wrench and bleeding from the head, you reach the bathysphere and prepare for ascension.
(→R1)
If you read Martyrdom:
Whatever Atlas gave you worked, that ADAM glowing in your veins, as Ryan's men never stood a chance. You enter the bathysphere and prepare to takeoff.
(→R1)
If you read Only Man:
Against all odds, with a city full of crazies hunting you down, you manage to escape with Booker and Annabelle into the bathysphere station. The lighthouse is calling.
(→R1)

cards.name: Scrounger
cards.text:
Permanent. Limit 1 per deck.
[reaction] After you reveal a new location or put a new location into play: Gain 1 resource.

cards.name: Static Discharge
cards.text:
Permanent. Limit 1 per deck.
[reaction] After dealing damage at a [[Sunken]] location with a [[Plasmid]], [[Spell]] or [[Trick]] card, you may immediately perform an evade action against that enemy. If you do, that enemy gets -1 evade.

cards.name: Burning Sensation
cards.text: Revelation - Take X damage, where X is the amount of [[ADAM]] assets you control (including permanents). If you took 1 or fewer damage by this effect, shuffle Burning Sensation back into your deck.

cards.name: Selfless, To A Fault
cards.text: Revelation - Put Selfless, To A Fault into play in your threat area. Forced - After you commit cards to other investigators' skill tests or affect other investigators with player card effects: Lose 1 action during your current or next turn. [action][action]: Discard Selfless, To A Fault.

cards.name: Monument Tower
cards.text: Forced - After you move a clue from Monument Tower to another location, if it was during... - the mythos phase, draw an encounter card. - the investigation phase, spend 2 resources. - the enemy phase, rotate Songbird. - the upkeep phase, discard a card from your hand.

cards.flavor: A massive electrical current runs through the heart of this stone-hewn statue, as blinding rays of sunshine shoot through the windows. It is a startling juxtaposition to Persephone, wherever it is you are.
cards.name: Monument Tower

cards.flavor: A horde of bloodied, working class citizens scramble through the crowds, their arms and tattered jackets obscuring what's in their hands.
cards.name: Atlas' Court
cards.text: [action]: Test [combat] (4). If you succeed, remove a token placed on Ryan's Court ([[Center]]).

cards.name: Atlas' Court
cards.text: Forced - After you fail a skill test at this location: Place 1 horror token on Atlas. [free] [[Criminal]], [[Believer]], or [[Performer]] investigators at this location, draw the top card of the encounter deck: Either flip this location over or remove 2 horror tokens from Atlas. (Group limit once per round.)

cards.flavor:
"To the Tyrant, the whole of creation is held in the relative — sun and moon revolve for him alone."
-- Sofia Lamb
cards.name: The Butterfly Effect
cards.text: Revelation - Place 1 doom on Sofia Lamb. Then, test [intellect] (3). For each point you fail by, place 1 additional doom on her.

cards.flavor: Dozens flock to Lamb's court in a trance-like state. Hands extended to the heavens, eyes glazed over in delirious fervor.
cards.name: Lamb's Court
cards.text: [free] Discard 2 events from your hand: Remove a token from any location in this court. (Group limit once per round).

cards.name: Lamb's Court
cards.text: Forced - After you fail a skill test at this location: Place 2 doom on Sofia Lamb. [free] [[Artist]], [[Assistant]], or [[Silver Twilight]] investigators at this location, discard 2 events from your hand: Either flip this location over or remove 4 doom from Sofia Lamb. (Group limit once per round.)

cards.name: Foul Paralysis
cards.text: Revelation - Put Foul Paralysis into play in your threat area. Each [[Plasmid]] asset enters play with 1 fewer eve. [action]: Remove a [[Gene Tonic]] you control from the game. Any investigator may trigger this ability.
